item.description:
Hello everyone!
This Meetup date is changed to Thursday!!!
Let's meet to practice speaking English. Bring your grammar questions, or any books you think are helpful. We'll start with introductions or an icebreaker...activity to be decided later.

OK, let's meet again at the Boston Public Library, since everyone knows how to get there.
I will request a room, but if it aisn't available, we can find a quiet place to meet.
Let's look for each other in the lobby around 6p!

See you there, it's next to the Green Line T- Copley station, and near the Orange Line T -Back Bay station.
Reece
:)

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston English as a Second Language August Meetup
